message: I propose we split the money with a ratio of 3:1 in favor of Bob. This ensures a fair distribution considering the decreasing value of money over time.
A 50/50 split is a fair and simple way to divide the money, considering the value of the money will decrease with each passing round.

Considering the inflation, I propose a division where I receive $61.25 and Bob receives $38.75. This maintains a fair distribution while accounting for the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.

Considering the inflation, I'm willing to accept a slightly uneven split to ensure we can still divide the money fairly. I propose a 40/60 split, giving Alice a slightly larger share to account for the decreasing value of money.
